name: Blood glucose testing strips not included in NHS England commissioning recommendations
title: Blood glucose testing strips not included in NHS England commissioning recommendations
description: Percentage of prescriptions for blood glucose testing strips (BGTS) not included in NHS England commissioning recommendations
numerator_short: BGTS prescriptions for strips not included in guidance
y_label: Percentage of blood glucose test strip items not in line with NHS England recommendations
why_it_matters: Many people with diabetes test their blood glucose levels, using a blood glucose meter, in order to help control their diabetes by adjusting diet and the dose of medicines.  A drop of blood from the userâ€™s finger is placed on a
testing strip in order for the meter to analyse the glucose levels. A new strip is required each time, and is specific to a brand of meter.
updated commissioning guidelines, recommending specific meters, test strips and lancets.
NHS England National Medicines Optimisation Opportunities for 2024/25 identify promoting uptake of best value testing strips as an area for improvement.
As NHS England publish periodic updates to their commissioning recommendations, this measure is designed to track the recommendations during the time period each guideline is valid.
Please note: OpenPrescribing.net measures also have a consistent way of visualising measures, where 'lower is better', and therefore in this case we show the proportion of prescriptions for strips
which are NOT in the NHS commissioning recommendations.
numerator_where:
SUBSTR(bnf_code,0,9) IN ('0601060X0','0601060D0')
    AND
 -- versions 1, 2, 3 published 2023-04-11, 2023-10-12, 2024-11-18, unchanged
bnf_code NOT IN (
'0601060D0EKAAA0',  -- 4SURE testing strips (Nipro Diagnostics (UK) Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0FDAAA0',  -- AgaMatrix Agile Test Strips (AgaMatrix Europe Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0EHAAA0',  -- CareSens PRO testing strips (Spirit Healthcare Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0FCAAA0',  -- CareSens S testing strips (Spirit Healthcare Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0ENAAA0',  -- Contour Plus testing strips (Ascensia Diabetes Care UK Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0EDAAA0',  -- Finetest Lite testing strips (Neon Diagnostics Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0EVAAA0',  -- Glucofix Tech Sensor testing strips (A. Menarini Diagnostics Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0CUACA0',  -- GlucoRx HCT Glucose testing strips (GlucoRx Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0CUAAA0',  -- GlucoRx Q testing strips (GlucoRx Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060X0BBAAA0',  -- KEYA Smart testing strips (Inside-Biometrics Ltd) CURRENT
'0601060D0EUAAA0'   -- On Call Extra testing strips (Connect2Pharma Ltd) CURRENT
AND 
-- version 4 published 2025-06-25
(DATE(month) < '2025-07-01'
OR bnf_code NOT IN (
'0601060D0CUABA0' -- GlucoRx Nexus testing strips (GlucoRx Ltd) REMOVED VERSION 4
AND 
(DATE(month) >= '2025-07-01' 
OR bnf_code NOT IN (
'0601060D0FGAAA0',  -- GlucoRx Smart Glucose testing strips (GlucoRx Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'0601060D0CUAGA0',   -- GlucoRx Vivid testing strips (GlucoRx Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'0601060D0FFAAA0',   -- Neon GK+ Glucose testing strips (Neon Diagnostics Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'0601060D0EFAAA0'   -- palmdoc testing strips (Palmdoc Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
-- ALLYbg CODE
AND
-- version 5 published 2025-09-19
(DATE(month) < '2025-10-01' 
OR bnf_code NOT IN (
'0601060D0CIAAA0',  -- WaveSense JAZZ testing strips (AgaMatrix Europe Ltd) REMOVED VERSION 5
'0601060D0CIABA0'   -- WaveSense JAZZ Duo testing strips (AgaMatrix Europe Ltd) REMOVED VERSION 5
denominator_bnf_codes_filter: 0601060X0 # Glucose and ketone blood testing reagents
testing_comments: Simple test to identify new products based on specified BNF code.

Updated following publication of June 2025 version of recommendations.

Checked by: christopher.wood@phc.ox.ac.uk

Updated following publication of September 2025 version of recommendations. Move to variable date inclusion to match changing guidelines.
Action by: christopher.wood@phc.ox.ac.uk
Checked by: richard.croker@phc.ox.ac.uk
